ygData.subject: Smithing...please help
ygData.msgSnippet: hi all, i just started smithing, i put five practice points on it at my last lev up. i bought two books on it so far, one about arms and armor and one with
ygData.messageBody:
hi all,<br>i just started smithing, i put five
practice points on it at my last lev up. i bought two
books on it so far, one about arms and armor and one
with the ingredients for a buncha different stuff i
think the book is basic blacksmithing. my first
question is do i need to find all the blacksmithing books
before i can smith? are they required? also, WHERE can i
find sharpening stones? i was told that they are good
for increasing the skill in the early stages but
nobody has them in felwithe or keleth. any advice on
this skill is most
appreciated.<br><br>thanks<br>Talrasha<br>10thlev Wiz<br>Veeshan
